data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Surendranagar, Gujarat, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Surendranagar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Surendranagar, Gujarat, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Surendranagar, Gujarat, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,736,981 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Surendranagar to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Chatla people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
the county of Surendranagar has (about) 19,319 people who know Jesus, 21,310 people who know about him culturally, and 1,715,671 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,756,300 citizens of the the county of Surendranagar.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Surendranagar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
